about_the_game:
Have you ever felt trapped? Like you want to escape your leathery prison? It's time to upgrade your cock to freedom in Chicken Tricks! Fight through waves of enemies for your good ol' american freedom, using all the weapons at your disposals... Which aren't many, because you're a chicken... ya know.




Peck, poisons, explosive eggs, everything just works in Chicken Tricks. Use them to defeat your enemies, which will grant you with a determined amount of XP. Once you have enough, you will level up, which lets you choose one of 4 possible upgrades. Choose new abilities to slap your way through making new and different builds avoiding death.

Each level, the spawn rate of mobs raises and, each 5 levels, several improved enemies will spawn, making sure of making your mission harder to accomplish. If you get killed while at maximum level possible, a little surprise awaits.





Just do anything to make sure you don't become another one in the line of the next KFC frier, and save your legacy from that doomed fate!

name: Chicken Tricks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) / Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Quad Core (x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000; 1GB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible sound card and drivers.
  • Additional Notes: 60FPS @ 720p
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad Core (x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 950 or better; 2GB Or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible sound card and drivers.
  • Additional Notes: 60FPS @ 1080p

short_description: Peck, dodge and shoot your way through endless waves of enemies. Upgrade your Chick and prove you have what is needed to avoid being turned into fried chicken.
